description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Code-Projects Exam Form Submission 1.0 allows attackers to run arbitrary code via "Subject Name" and "Subject Code" section.
Vulnerabilidad de Cross Site Scripting (XSS) en Code-Projects Exam Form Submission 1.0 permite a atacantes ejecutar código arbitrario a través de la sección "Nombre del sujeto" y "Código del asunto".
